name: Punch Trunk!
description:
It's panic in the streets as a tiny elephant visits the big city! 

It began after the pint sized pachyderm emerged from a crate of bananas down at the docks, spreading mayhem and confusion. Where will the tiny elephant go next? What will the tiny elephant do?  That's up to you!

------- FEATURES ------- 

- Play as a fully grown bull elephant - but only 5 inches tall!

- Explore the city and cause mischief!

- Complete OBJECTIVES and discover ACHEIVEMENTS that reward wacky behavior and exploration!

- Drive the populace INSANE with your MERE PRESENCE as you track down collectable ( and delectable) peanuts!

- Build up SCREAMING POWER  and release it to scare people from a distance!

- Hide in bushes or under benches to sneak around town in STEALTH!

- Supports gamepad and mouse/keyboard inputs!

----------------------  

KEYBOARD CONTROLS:
MOVE- W,A,S,D
ADJUST CAMERA - MOUSE
TOGGLE SPRINT- LEFT SHIFT
OPEN/CLOSE ACHEIVEMENTS LIST - 1 or LEFTARROW
OPEN/CLOSE OBJECTIVES LIST - 2 or RIGHT ARROW
CHARGE/RELEASE SCREAM - F 
INTERACT/ENTER/RIDE/STOP RIDING - E
PICKUP/THROW OBJECTS - LEFT MOUSE BUTTON
DROP HELD OBJECTS - MOUSE MIDDLE BUTTON
LOCK-ON AIM - RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON
OLLIE SKATEBOARD CHARGE/RELEASE - SPACEBAR

----------------------

GAMEPAD CONTROLS:
MOVE- Left Stick
ADJUST CAMERA - Right Stick
TOGGLE SPRINT- L3
OPEN/CLOSE ACHEIVEMENTS LIST - LB
OPEN/CLOSE OBJECTIVES LIST - RB
CHARGE/RELEASE SCREAM - RT
INTERACT/ENTER/RIDE/STOP RIDING - Y BUTTON
PICKUP/THROW OBJECTS - X BUTTON
DROP HELD OBJECTS - B BUTTON
LOCK-ON AIM - LT
OLLIE SKATEBOARD CHARGE/RELEASE - A BUTTON
